remarks: Vector addition on a subspace is a restriction of vector addition on the parent space.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sspg.y $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
sspg.g $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
sspg.f $e |- F = ( +v ` W ) $.
sspg.h $e |- H = ( SubSp ` U ) $.
sspg $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H ) -> F = ( G |` ( Y X. Y ) ) ) $.
